block.p: ANAHEIM ANGELS--Purchased contract of INF Troy Glaus from Vancouver of the PCL. Optioned LHP Jarrod Washburn to Vancouver. Transferred RHP Mike James and 1B Todd Greene to 60-day disabled list. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Traded C Charlie O'Brien to the Anaheim Angels for LHP Jason Stockstill and RHP Brian Tokarse. Purchased the contract of RHP Chad Bradford from Calgary of the PCL. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated 2B Scott Spiezio from the 15-day disabled list. Sent OF Jack Voigt to Edmonton of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Traded 1B-DH Mike Stanley to the Boston Red Sox for RHP Peter Munro and RHP Jay Yennaco.

ANAHEIM ANGELS--Purchased contract of INF Troy Glaus from Vancouver of the PCL. Optioned LHP Jarrod Washburn to Vancouver. Transferred RHP Mike James and 1B Todd Greene to 60-day disabled list. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Traded C Charlie O'Brien to the Anaheim Angels for LHP Jason Stockstill and RHP Brian Tokarse. Purchased the contract of RHP Chad Bradford from Calgary of the PCL. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated 2B Scott Spiezio from the 15-day disabled list. Sent OF Jack Voigt to Edmonton of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Traded 1B-DH Mike Stanley to the Boston Red Sox for RHP Peter Munro and RHP Jay Yennaco.

ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Activated RHP Felix Rodriguez from 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Bob Wolcott to Tucson of the PCL. ATLANTA BRAVES--Traded RHP David Cortes and LHP Mike Porzio to the Colorado Rockies for 1B Greg Colbrunn. CHICAGO CUBS--Optioned RHP Rodney Myers to Iowa of the PCL. Transferred RHP Jeremi Gonzalez to the 60-day disabled list. CINCINNATI REDS--Placed OF Mike Frank on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 27.
BALTIMORE RAVENS--Signed DB-KR Tyrone Hughes. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Waived WR Terry Guess.

BUFFALO SABRES--Signed C Domenic Pittis and C Craig Fisher. DALLAS STARS--Signed LW David Roberts to a one-year contract. EDMONTON OILERS--Announced the retirement of D Kevin Lowe and named him assistant coach. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Announced the retirement of G Kelly Hrudey. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed C Jesse Belanger. Re-signed RW Corey Spring.

BROCKPORT STATE--Named John Dumaw softball coach. Promoted Nanette Fox to field hockey coach. CENTRAL FLORIDA--Named Miriam Ochoa volleyball coach. DARTMOUTH--Named Erica Walsh women's assistant soccer coach and Jane Taylor assistant strength and conditioning coach. DICKINSON--Named Kris Carroll interim field hockey and women's lacrosse coach. HARVARD--Named Tim Murphy men's swimming and diving coach. EAST CAROLINA--Named Tom Morris men's and women's tennis coach. KINGS POINT--Named Jim Anson men's assistant soccer and lacrosse coach. NEW ORLEANS--Named Gary Gallup, director of athletic marketing and promotions, and Nikita Johnson, men's assistant basketball coach. TEXAS-PAN AMERICAN--Named Kevin Brown administrative assistant for men's basketball. WESTMINSTER--Named Girish Thakar men's soccer coach.
